contentrichtext.text: The entry doesn't have any context, nor pages linking to it, in addition, doesn't really impart much information, the title has nothing to do with the article, and finally, doesn't seem very encyclopedic. Seems much more like an outline of a plan for a new organization. -[[User:Yizzerin|Yizzerin]] 00:13, May 18, 2004 (UTC) *Right. Delete, the sooner the better.[[User:Beelzebubs|Beelzebubs]] 00:14, 18 May 2004 (UTC) *Oy, it's been around for months. Delete. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 00:15, 18 May 2004 (UTC) * Has that copyvio cut-and-paste look to it. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 00:36, May 18, 2004 (UTC)
